source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

objectives_summary: Learn how to create a realistic asset in film quality standard
Understand how to optimize the model to meet industry standards for rendering
Create LODs(Level of Distance)

items.title: Learn Blender 3D - The Project course
items.headline: Learn the basics of modelling, materials, rigging, rendering and animation using Blender3D
objectives_summary: Model a character from scratch
Apply materials to give our model appearance
Rig an object to prepare it for animations

items.headline: Make brilliant animation to fit your brand with Renderforest. Amazing quality of the templates, unique drawing styles!
objectives_summary: Make  video ads like a Pro, really; like you see on on tv!
Make brilliant, ingenious animations to fit your brand and style
Pay per animation, no subscription needed

items.title: The Complete guide to 3d Motion Graphics in Cinema 4d
items.headline: Kickstart your career by Mastering all the skills needed for 3d Motion Graphics in Cinema 4d.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to model, animate, light and render using octane and physical render
Students will learn how to make title openers, 3d text animations, cloth animations and sports intro
student will also learn how to create dynamic simulations ( rigid and softbody sims, spline dynamics and cloth simulations)

items.title: Blender 3.0: Product Animation MasterClass
items.headline: For Absolute Beginners!
objectives_summary: 3D Modeling Basics
Product Lighting
Compositing

items.title: Create a Dynamic 2.5D Rig with Body Turn - Moho Anime Studio
items.headline: Learn how to easily create a Dynamic 2.5D rig with full body turn and perspective in Anime Studio/Moho
objectives_summary: Have a full working easy to animate  2.D Dynamic Rig with Body Turn
Develop your 2D Character Rigging skills in Anime Studio/Moho
Improve your Work Flow and make professional Animations

items.title: Learn the Basics of Blender in Just 30 Minutes!
items.headline: Learn about Blender 2.8 with me. A Blender freelancer and instructor
objectives_summary: You will know how to create basic models in Blender 3D to impress your friends
You will be able to bring your models into Unity for your games
You will be able to create basic animations

items.title: Modeling and Rendering Cute Characters in Maya 2020
items.headline: Learn how to create 3D models, how to texture models, and how to master lighting and rendering techniques in Maya
objectives_summary: You will earn how to use Maya's tools to create 3D modeling, and how to use lighting and rendering techniques to finish your model and make it look professional.

items.title: World Machine: Terrains from NASA Satellite images
items.headline: World Machine: Find NASA Satellite images, import them, create terrains, go wild with your creativity using ANY image
objectives_summary: To make your own realistic terrains from real satellite images of the NASA
To create terrains from clipart
To create terrains from ANY image whatsoever, even color pictures

items.title: Hard Surface Vehicle UV Mapping in Maya
items.headline: Learn how create multiple UV maps for a single object.
objectives_summary: Learn how to UV map complex models.
Learn how to transfer a UV to another object.
Learn when and when not to use Automatic Mapping.

items.title: Adobe After Effects - Complete Course
items.headline: Adobe AE complete guide for Begginers to be Ninja!
objectives_summary: Starting with Introduction to After Effects
After Effects Interface
Creating a New Composition

items.title: How To Make Awesome Animated Movies
items.headline: Everything You Need To Know To Make Your Imagination Come To Life
objectives_summary: 2D animation
How to navigate and use Pencil 2D, a free animation program
Animation physics, including inertia, acceleration, and cause and effect

items.title: Remote Sensing Introduction

visible_instructors.name: AulaGEO
visible_instructors.job_title: Specialists in GIS - BIM - LAND and Smart process training
visible_instructors.title: AulaGEO Academy

items.headline: Discover the power of Remote Sensing, using satellite - or aircraft- based sensor technologies
objectives_summary: Understand basic concepts of Remote Sensing.
Understand the physical principles behind the interaction of EM radiation and the multiple types of soil cover (vegetation, water, minerals, rocks, etc.).
Understand how atmospheric components can affect a signal recorded by remote sensing platforms and how to correct them.

Learn ZBrush's Fibermesh system to paint hair, fur, and more!
